otherNames: Nissin Cup Noodles China x Gintamam, 银魂 X 合味道
synopsis:
Chinese streaming platform Weibo is hosting exclusive Gintama footage. The ad is in Japanese with Chinese subtitles showing the characters enjoying Cup Noodles' Chinese brand, Hé Wèi Dào.

Gintama is titled and marketed as Yinhun in China.
